name: puppet-lint
description: Check that your Puppet manifests conform to the style guide.

plugins.name: trailing_newline
plugins.description: Extends puppet-lint to ensure that your manifest files end with newlines.

plugins.name: variable_contains_upcase
plugins.description: Extends puppet-lint to ensure that your variables are all lower case.

plugins.name: param_docs
plugins.description: A check for puppet-lint that validates all parameters are documented.

plugins.name: roles_and_profiles
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check that a node definition declares only a role, a role class does not have any param and only declares profiles, and a profiles class can declare anything but a role.

plugins.name: vim_modeline
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check for vim comment (modeline) as the last line in a manifest.

plugins.name: strict_indent
plugins.description: Extends puppet-lint to ensure that your manifests follow a strict indentation pattern.

plugins.name: unquoted_string
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check that selectors and case statements cases are quoted.

plugins.name: empty_string
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check for variables assigned to the empty string.

plugins.name: spaceship_operator_without_tag
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check that spaceship operator is called with a tag.

plugins.name: absolute_classname
plugins.description: Puppet-lint plugin to check relative class name inclusions.

plugins.name: leading_zero
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check for unquoted numbers with leading zero.

plugins.name: newmericvariable
plugins.description: Extends puppet-lint to ensure that your variables are not numeric.

plugins.name: file_ensure
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check the ensure attribute on file resources.

plugins.name: trailing_comma
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check for missing trailing commas.

plugins.name: version_comparison
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check for versions compared as numbers.

plugins.name: global_resource
plugins.description: Extends puppet-lint to ensure that your manifests have no global resources.

plugins.name: appends
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check that the appends operator (+=) is not used (removed in Puppet 4.0.0).

plugins.name: classes_and_types_beginning_with_digits
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check for types and class names that begin with digits.

plugins.name: file_source_rights
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check file rights when providing a source.

plugins.name: alias
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check for alias parameters in resources.

plugins.name: security
plugins.description: Checks puppet manifests for security related problems.

plugins.name: usascii_format
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check that manifest files contain only US ASCII.

plugins.name: package_ensure
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check the ensure attribute on package resources.

plugins.name: resource_reference_syntax
plugins.description: Extends puppet-lint to ensure that the reference syntax follows Puppet 4 style.

plugins.name: undef_in_function
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check for undef in function calls.

plugins.name: fileserver
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check if puppet:/// is used instead of file().

plugins.name: absolute_template
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check if paths to the template() function are relative.

plugins.name: resource_outside_class
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check if resources exist outside of a class or defined type.

plugins.name: top_scope_facts
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check for top scope facts that should use the facts hash instead.

plugins.name: legacy_facts
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check for legacy facts that have been replaced with new structured facts.

plugins.name: resource_reference_outside_class
plugins.description: A puppet-lint plugin to check for references which are declared outside of the class where the reference is used.
